name: Forest of Smiles
description:
Forest of smiles is a game demo created during a game engine scripting class. Run and jump along platforms until you find yourself free from the forest of demonic smiles.please enjoy your walk though the forest.

Design & Programming By:
 Timothy A. Chatman

Art Assets By:
